name: Connected Platforms
description:
This is my submission for DevSquad Academy Jam, which was a 14-day jam with the theme: "Connected Worlds".

I would classify myself as a beginner... And this game jam theme is really difficult! So here is a tiny platformer that has connected levels.

As usual I didn't get as far as I wanted to, but New Years is approaching and I didn't want to work on this during that. 

The highlight of the project is probably just simple jumping mechanics and a functional ladder - both of which gave me some problems. This was very much MapleStory inspired but in 3D!
